info.name: RainLoop (deprecated, consider Snappymail)
info.description: Rainloop is not maintained anymore. Consider a switch to Snappymail which is an actively-maintained fork of Rainloop. After enabling in Nextcloud, go to Nextcloud admin panel, "Additionnal settings" and you will see a "Rainloop webmail" section. There, click on the link to go to the Rainloop admin panel. The default user/password is admin/12345. This version is based on Rainloop 1.16.0 (2021-05).
info.author: RainLoop Team, Nextgen-Networks, Tab Fitts, Nathan Kinkade, Pierre-Alain Bandinelli
